t: KEY CITY FURNITURE COMPANY - Encyclopedia Dubuque
s: In 1880 the family of Valentine HERANCOURT sold their interest in the family-owned business to a newly formed enterprise, the Key City Furniture Company established in February, 1880 by Herman MAUER, the company president, and others. (1) The company opened on February 18, 1880.
